Lack enough support: The claim lacks legitimate news reports and evidence to back it up.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Jeff Sessions colluded with Obama without providing any evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Jeff Sessions recused himself from investigations related to the campaigns for presidency.
Understate: There is no evidence presented to understate or downplay the claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence presented to exaggerate the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing any evidence or legitimate news reports.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by Jeff Sessions himself, stating that he consulted senior officials and his staff recommended recusal based on his involvement with the campaign.
